definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
to make sth of oneself/to become a person who is worthy of respect
a person who has passed the county level imperial exam (historical)/scholar/skillful writer/fine talent

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 誰讓你起得這麼晚，整個赤血宮就你這個時辰才起牀。

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲是在這種情況下，國際援助和監督才很重要。

sentences.english: The four-letter words were always edited out of radio scripts until quite recently.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近廣播稿中的庸俗詞語才讓保留下來。

sentences.english: It is the great who is assailed by envy.
sentences.chinese: 正是大人物才受到嫉妒的中傷。

sentences.english: So when I woke up early this morning at 8am it was actually only 7am.
sentences.chinese: 所以，當我早上8點醒來時，實際上才7點鐘。

sentences.english: At this time, party boat is a sweet promise only to find the police.
sentences.chinese: 這時，方小舟才發現許嫣然是個警察。

sentences.english: The Chinese Exclusion Act was repealed only in 1943.
sentences.chinese: 直到1943年排華法案才被取消。

sentences.english: Or maybe curiosity is a better word.
sentences.chinese: 或者，好奇才是更確切的詞。

sentences.english: Only those sports which are practised on snow or ice are considered as winter sports.
sentences.chinese: 只有雪上和冰上項目才被認爲是冬季體育運動。

sentences.english: He waited until he heard shots. Then he peered through the skylight, into the darkened tavern.
sentences.chinese: 他等到槍聲響起，才透過天窗朝陰暗的酒館內看去。

sentences.english: Hope scars, realized that even with life, are often trapped.
sentences.chinese: 望滿身傷痕，才明白即使嬉笑一生，也常被困。

sentences.english: I don't know what season's singing is so loud and clear.
sentences.chinese: 不知道是什麼季節的歌聲才那麼嘹亮。

sentences.english: It took him quite some time to pick off the burs that had stuck to his coat.
sentences.chinese: 花了好長時間他才把粘在衣服上的刺摘掉。

sentences.english: You don't have to do something to make me feel so sad.
sentences.chinese: 你不一定要做錯什麼事情才讓我如此傷心難過。

sentences.english: In Pas-de-Calais the French lifestyle is better.
sentences.chinese: 加萊海峽省的法式生活才更逍遙。

sentences.english: It took Cindy a long time to catch on to what Bill was saying.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪許久以後才突然明白比爾所說的話。

definition: to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
